"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" (a_1 - a_2)^2 + (a_2 - a_3)^2 + (a_3 - a_4)^2 + \cdots + (a_9 - a_{10})^2 + (a_{10} - a_1)^2 \; = \; 4 "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
and so the integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_1= a_1 - a_2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_2 = a_2 - a_3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ..., "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_9 = a_9 - a_{10}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_{10} = a_{10} - a_1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are such that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" -2 \le b_j \le 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for all "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", while
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" b_1 + b_2 + \cdots + b_{10} = 0 \hspace{2cm} b_1^2 +b_2^2 + \cdots  + b_{10}^2 = 4 "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
We cannot have a single "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" equal to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\pm2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", with the rest zero, and so we deduce that two of the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" must be equal to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and another two must be equal to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". There are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\binom{10}{4}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ways of choosing which of the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" numbers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are to be nonzero."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If we consider the four nonzero numbers:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"if they appear in any of the orders "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1,1,-1-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1,-1,-1,1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1,-1,1,1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1,1,1,-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then the values of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" increase and decrease by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" over the length of the sequence. Thus there is only one possible pattern of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" which yields each of these patterns of nonzero "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"if they appear in either of the orders "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1,-1,1,-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1,1,-1,1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then the values of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" only need to be able to rise and fall by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" over the sequence. Thus there are two possible "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sequences for each of these "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" patterns."}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus we have a total of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\binom{10}{4} \times (4 \times 1 + 2 \times 2) = 1680"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sequences of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_j"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", making the answer "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{3780}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"
